thread.title: telecookies

comments.text: telecookies or teleoranges are holdables which when eaten, make your voice be heard in all the area. [steamimage: 931552695946671180/02E777B1B098183A4BB352A95FD1E5C7394BDA64/]
to create such a thing yourself, while in create mode click "..." and pick "amplify speech when held", as well as "consumable".
when handling holdables later, make sure you're in non-change things mode. also see [-> change things mode]
(this feature was invented through experimentation, utilizing the fact that eaten microphones aren't properly disposed!)
here's a cookie you can collect.

thread.latestCommentText: here's a cookie you can collect.
